title: New: Clea – Polyester
body:
I’m a sucker for a good storyteller, and **Clea** (Pratt) certainly has that trait in her locker.

Delicate Laura Marling meets Regina Spektor folk, it’s her voice that forms the focal point of the song, a touching ode to growing pains. Check out Polyester below, and keep up with Clea over at [Facebook](https://soundcloud.com/cleacleamusic).

Delicate Laura Marling meets Regina Spektor folk, it’s her voice that forms the focal point of the song, a touching ode to growing pains. Check out Polyester below, and keep up with Clea over at Facebook.
